title: Irondequoit Hots... CLOSED?!
body: <p><em>WhaaaAAAAAAAAAAAA?!?!?!</em> Sherry and I were going to get some <a href="http://www.geocities.com/garbageplates/">Hog Plates (a decent Garbage Plate imitation)</a> tonight and Irondequoit Hots had all the windows papered and the sign below was on the "rear entrance" door. I just skimmed it but it sounds like they owe someone some money. When did this happen? I googled and all I could find was this <a href="http://www.democratandchronicle.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20050522/SPECIALS0701/505220308/0/SPECIALS07">mostly irrelevant D and C article</a>.</p><p><a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/diesel_travis/85087386/" title="Irondequoit Hots is CLOSED?!"><img src="http://static.flickr.com/38/85087386_e401027506.jpg" width="500" height="375" alt="Irondequoit Hots is CLOSED?!" /></a></p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2006-01-10

Irondequoit Hots... CLOSED?!

WhaaaAAAAAAAAAAAA?!?!?! Sherry and I were going to get some
